title: Seeing chests in draft lobby
body: When playing draft and deciding who you want to play, you also want to see if the champion you want to play has a chest available or not. I request that in draft you get to see which champions you have earned a chest on and which ones you have not, thank you, - SketchyShyGuy

replies.body: Thanks for the suggestion! You can see that info on your collection screen, so I'd try to double check that page before hopping into matches if getting more chests is your main priority, but I'll do my best to pass that idea along to the devs. You might also have a better shot at getting their attention if you post this over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)!
Thank you, i'll resend it there. Sometimes when I don't know what to play i'll join a game and forget if which champions I have chests on, but thank you for your reply.
